CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 25, 1969, pg. 15 reads: " S.A. Captain And Advisors - The Greene Hearthe in Homewood was the scene of the recent meeting of the Advisory Board of the Salvation Army Corp located at 8016 Frankstown Ave. Captain Israel L. Gaither, third from left, holds the agenda. Other executives and community leaders, board members present at eh time, reading from left are, Roy A. Hunt, Jr., vice president, Mellon Nat'l Bank; Don Richards, manager, president Pittsburgh Nat'l Bank, Homewood; Rev. Leroy Patrick, pastor Bethesda United Presbyterian Church; Lt. Col. John Waldron, divisional commander and D. Maxwell Seeley, retired U.S. Steel executive - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Roy A. Hunt, Jr., Don Richards, Israel L. Gaither, Rev. Leroy Patrick, John Waldron, and D. Maxwell Seeley, posed in Greene Hearth for the Salvation Army Advisory Board meeting
